description:
Lightweight replacement of Lenovo Vantage for Lenovo Legion laptops.

Lenovo Legion Toolkit (LLT) is a utility created for Lenovo Legion laptops, that allows changing a couple of features that are only available in Lenovo Vantage or Legion Zone.
Release Notes
General
- Fixed an issue where resuming from hibernation caused LLT to crash.
- Fixed an issue where GodModeController raised errors. (#91, #90, #96)
- Fixed an issue where Extreme Performance Mode was displayed on unsupported devices.
- Fixed an issue where the Extreme default preset was shown on unsupported devices.
- Fixed an issue where hiding GPU VRAM temperature on the dashboard did not take effect.
- Fixed an intermittent issue where CPU power readings would freeze.
- Fixed an issue where the Status Window would not refresh sensor data.
- Fixed an issue where Custom Mode was incorrectly displayed while running on battery.
- Fixed an issue where accessing deleted driver links caused an exception on the Downloads page.
- Fixed an issue where navigating away from the RGB page would cause an error.
- Fixed an issue that caused Custom Mode to appear while on battery power.
- Fixed an issue where the Extreme default preset appeared on unsupported devices.
- Fixed an issue where AMD devices displayed "PCH" instead of "Motherboard."
- Fixed an issue where Extreme Mode was shown on unsupported devices.
- Fixed an issue involving a mismatch in CPU utilization calculation.
- Re-enabled the warranty feature for Chinese models.
- Added an ITS Mode pop-up in the Notifications panel.
- Added an ITS Mode notification to the Status Window.
- Updated the PresentMonFps library; invalid data will no longer be captured.
- Moved the Dashboard Customize options to the Settings page and improved the related logic.
- Improved overall performance.
Feature
- Added Precision Boost Overdrive (PBO2) adjustments for AMD Laptops.
Notes:
- Disable the Enable Overclocking option in third-party utilities (e.g., Hydra or UXTU) or disable this feature to prevent configuration override.
- LLT cannot read the real-time overclocking value. Like Legion Space/Legion Zone, it displays the value from the configuration file.
- Legion Optimize must be enabled for this feature to function for safe.

- Added Power Mode / Plan for different Custom Mode presets.
  For this feature, Disable Power Mode Sync Feature in Legion Zone or Legion Space is needed to prevent issues.

- Added Performance / Efficient Core frequency to Floating Gadget.
- Added Spectrum support for Legion 5 24 Zone Keyboards.
- Added warning to Custom Mode while first start.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/XKaguya/LenovoLegionToolkit/compare/v2.26.9.8...v2.27.0.0
